item.title: Mister Sloff Commercial
item.description: 'Mister Sloff' is my first short animated film, made during the first year of Animation, in the 4th year of studies at the Faculty of Applied Arts in Belgrade. The film is in the form of a commercial for a little series of handbags I made of the character, Mister Sloff.
item.content:encoded: 'Mister Sloff' is my first short animated film, made during the first year of Animation, in the 4th year of studies at the Faculty of Applied Arts in Belgrade. The film is in the form of a commercial for a little series of handbags I made of the character, Mister Sloff.

item.title: NDOTO Tanzania dream , the people.
item.description: Sometimes I have been in places so beyond my imagination. Then nothing else should be done then simply to record it. That's what I did in Tanzania.
item.content:encoded: Sometimes I have been in places so beyond my imagination. Then nothing else should be done then simply to record it. That's what I did in Tanzania.

item.title: I AM MADE OF ROBOTS
item.description: A series of posters exploring a world in which robots with double-sided faces made of audio cassettes exist as everyday consumer products. Unfortunately, a nightmarish bloodlust of genocidal proportions is easily triggered by mistake when switching between the house cleaning and child raising modes of operation. Whoops!
item.content:encoded: A series of posters exploring a world in which robots with double-sided faces made of audio cassettes exist as everyday consumer products. Unfortunately, a nightmarish bloodlust of genocidal proportions is easily triggered by mistake when switching between the house cleaning and child raising modes of operation. Whoops!

item.title: FLOW THEORY
item.description: flow the state in which people are so involved in an activity that nothing else seems to matter; the experience itself is so enjoyable that people will do it even at great cost, for the sheer sake of doing it. (Csikzentmihalyi, 1991)
item.content:encoded: flow the state in which people are so involved in an activity that nothing else seems to matter; the experience itself is so enjoyable that people will do it even at great cost, for the sheer sake of doing it. (Csikzentmihalyi, 1991)

item.title: Sideway? New York - Fuel Entertainment
item.description: Sideway? New York Battle your way through a twisted graffiti world where your prowess in puzzle solving makes the difference between life and death! Jump into one of the most unique and visually compelling 3D game worlds ever created. Follow the twisted journey of Nox, through a fast-paced 2D adventure set in a 3D world. Unlock new abilities to defeat enemies and rescue friends. Beware, in SidewayTM New York, you're in a world where your favorite color might just kill you! Additional Features: Experience an Adventure Platformer like you've never seen before! Master the challenges of changing camera angles and movement between 2D and 3D worlds! Collect unlockable abilities that let you SOAR, SLIDE, JUMP and BLAST through your enemies. Play both the single player campaign and drop-in/drop-out local co-op campaigns. Fight bizarre boss battles, including a sadistic pink bunny that vomits sadistic pink mini-bunnies...yeah, we've got that! Check out SidewayTM New York's original Hip Hop music by Mr. Lif.
item.content:encoded: Sideway? New York Battle your way through a twisted graffiti world where your prowess in puzzle solving makes the difference between life and death! Jump into one of the most unique and visually compelling 3D game worlds ever created. Follow the twisted journey of Nox, through a fast-paced 2D adventure set in a 3D world. Unlock new abilities to defeat enemies and rescue friends. Beware, in SidewayTM New York, you're in a world where your favorite color might just kill you! Additional Features: Experience an Adventure Platformer like you've never seen before! Master the challenges of changing camera angles and movement between 2D and 3D worlds! Collect unlockable abilities that let you SOAR, SLIDE, JUMP and BLAST through your enemies. Play both the single player campaign and drop-in/drop-out local co-op campaigns. Fight bizarre boss battles, including a sadistic pink bunny that vomits sadistic pink mini-bunnies...yeah, we've got that! Check out SidewayTM New York's original Hip Hop music by Mr. Lif.

item.title: Sardine Run 2011
item.description: These photographs reveal one of nature's greatest phenomena - the annual sardine run. Millions of the fish move north along the coast of South Africa where they are eaten by dolphins, sharks and gannets in a huge feeding frenzy.
item.content:encoded: These photographs reveal one of nature's greatest phenomena - the annual sardine run. Millions of the fish move north along the coast of South Africa where they are eaten by dolphins, sharks and gannets in a huge feeding frenzy.

item.title: Centrale Sans
item.description: Centrale Sans is a modern sans serif typeface. Geometric by its nature Centrale Sans is characterized with some humanistic touches, resulting in a warm, yet serious look. Its open apertures and overall wideness makes it pretty legible and readble at small sizes. The openness helps Centrale Sans to be pretty good performer as a web font too. Centrale Sans comes in pack of 7 weights plus their matching italicsYou can purchase it for 49$ instead of 250$ for the whole family until 1st of November 2011.
item.content:encoded: Centrale Sans is a modern sans serif typeface. Geometric by its nature Centrale Sans is characterized with some humanistic touches, resulting in a warm, yet serious look. Its open apertures and overall wideness makes it pretty legible and readble at small sizes. The openness helps Centrale Sans to be pretty good performer as a web font too. Centrale Sans comes in pack of 7 weights plus their matching italicsYou can purchase it for 49$ instead of 250$ for the whole family until 1st of November 2011.

item.title: I Fear You Girl (Dead Astronauts Promo One)
item.description: This is a collection of promo material and branding for my band Dead Astronauts. This was completed over the last 2-3 months and marks one of my largest repeating patterns to date. The collection will be available as a promotional wallpack once our first single is available for purchase (later this year).
item.content:encoded: This is a collection of promo material and branding for my band Dead Astronauts. This was completed over the last 2-3 months and marks one of my largest repeating patterns to date. The collection will be available as a promotional wallpack once our first single is available for purchase (later this year).

item.title: ENVIRONMENTAL AWARENESS
item.description: This is my BFA Thesis Show from 2007 focusing on Environmental Awareness. Can you imagine our planet and our way of life in fifty of hundred years from now? Consider this. We live in a profit-driven economy. Every decision is made with this question in mind: "What will bring us the most money?" Those decisions do not consider what is the best for the planet, but what is best for the economy financially. This series of work is to make you realize that if no action is taken we will create unsafe world for our children and grandchildren. The problem seems too big to feel as though our efforts will make a difference, so most of us don't even try. However, as long as put in any kind of effort with patience and persistence, you are doing exactly what you need to be doing to make a difference.
item.content:encoded: This is my BFA Thesis Show from 2007 focusing on Environmental Awareness. Can you imagine our planet and our way of life in fifty of hundred years from now? Consider this. We live in a profit-driven economy. Every decision is made with this question in mind: "What will bring us the most money?" Those decisions do not consider what is the best for the planet, but what is best for the economy financially. This series of work is to make you realize that if no action is taken we will create unsafe world for our children and grandchildren. The problem seems too big to feel as though our efforts will make a difference, so most of us don't even try. However, as long as put in any kind of effort with patience and persistence, you are doing exactly what you need to be doing to make a difference.

item.title: Idn Opening issue n18
item.description: The great Chinese magazine IDN called us to create the opening for its new DVD, attached to its print version. The main topics of its 19th launch were mappings, projections, 8bits and pixels, and we decided to put everything together inside a blender and to start mixing! The result was a Latin-American cocktail, highly explosive, full of color, and with a great rhythm thanks to our Daft Plenty VJ! It was the nice challenge. With a very little time we had to improvise and make something interesting that it mixes all these topics, taking in consideration the mapping technology. The origin of the Open was a corporeal Pixel. Yes! A 50cm white wood cube on which we projected and mapped a pure motiongraphics explosion! Full of patterns and geometric shapes re-adapted to the 8-bit world, inspired on the magic latinamerican ponchos and ancient indigenous graphites to finish with the IDN logo soaked in these colorful patterns.
item.content:encoded: The great Chinese magazine IDN called us to create the opening for its new DVD, attached to its print version. The main topics of its 19th launch were mappings, projections, 8bits and pixels, and we decided to put everything together inside a blender and to start mixing! The result was a Latin-American cocktail, highly explosive, full of color, and with a great rhythm thanks to our Daft Plenty VJ! It was the nice challenge. With a very little time we had to improvise and make something interesting that it mixes all these topics, taking in consideration the mapping technology. The origin of the Open was a corporeal Pixel. Yes! A 50cm white wood cube on which we projected and mapped a pure motiongraphics explosion! Full of patterns and geometric shapes re-adapted to the 8-bit world, inspired on the magic latinamerican ponchos and ancient indigenous graphites to finish with the IDN logo soaked in these colorful patterns.

item.title: The Violence of Flowers
item.description: The violence of flowers series explores our relationship with nature further. It draws an analogy between our darker side and the deception and violence inherent in the plant kingdom that is often masked by their beauty.
item.content:encoded: The violence of flowers series explores our relationship with nature further. It draws an analogy between our darker side and the deception and violence inherent in the plant kingdom that is often masked by their beauty.
